title: 5.4 Master Challenge 3
question:
Create a computational model to analyze the growth of investments over time under different scenarios (like interest rates, investment amounts, and time horizons) using Microsoft Excel and the compound interest formula.

Compound interest formula:
A = P (1 + r/n) nt

where,
● A is the future value of the investment;
● P is the initial invested amount;
● r is the annual interest rate;
● n is the number of times the interest is compounded per year;
● t is the number of years for which the money is invested.

Consider the initial amount, interest rate, and investment tenure of your choice.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11
